snippet: The cosmetics maker has discussed bringing in a private equity firm for what is known on Wall Street as a private investment in public equity or PIPE.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The cosmetics maker has discussed bringing in a private equity firm for what is known on Wall Street as a private investment in public equity or PIPE.

headline.main: Avon Is Said to Be in Talks About Selling a Stake
